title: Mood Board — Cross-platform ingestion audit
description: Comprehensive audit of ingestion and metadata behavior across TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and arbitrary websites. Ensure consistent flow, transcript availability, and UI behavior regardless of source.
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent ingestion flow across TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and websites
Transcript availability logic correct per platform (video platforms: yes, websites: no)
Consistent UI behavior regardless of media source
Metadata (title, thumbnail, platform badge) populated for all sources

steps.details: Add a TikTok URL. Verify: item creates, thumbnail populates, title populates, transcript available, insights extractable.
Add an Instagram URL. Verify same criteria as TikTok.
Add a YouTube URL. Verify same criteria. YouTube should use oEmbed for metadata.
Add an arbitrary website URL. Verify: item creates, title from OpenGraph, thumbnail from og:image, no transcript button (not a video), insights extractable.
Log any inconsistencies between platforms. Fix any remaining issues. Ensure platform badge displays correctly for each source type.

technicalNotes: This is a validation task — run after all individual platform fixes are complete
Keep a checklist of: item creation, title, thumbnail, transcript, insights for each platform
